attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Name of the form field.

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Title of the form field. This may be omitted and a title may be specified with a fieldLabel element.

attribute.name: width
attribute.description: Width of this field. Default to 90% screen width. Otherwise specify as a percentage.

attribute.name: widthMap
attribute.description: Width of this field as a map from device type to width values. Default to 90% screen width. Otherwise specify as a percentage.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Type of this field.

attribute.name: onblur
attribute.description: JavaScript function to execute when focus leaves this input element. Currently only implemented for type text.

attribute.name: condition
attribute.description: Optional, dynamic condition that determines if this form element is visible. Can either be a field name or a standalone expression.

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Optional style for the field contents.

attribute.name: styleMap
attribute.description: Optional map from device type to style. Overrides the style attribute.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Optional style class for the field contents.

attribute.name: styleClassMap
attribute.description: Optional map from device type to style class. Overrides the styleClass attribute.

attribute.name: titleStyleClass
attribute.description: Optional style class for the field title

attribute.name: valueText
attribute.description: Text to fill in this field.

attribute.name: editOnly
attribute.description: Indicates that this form field is available in edit mode only.

attribute.name: viewOnly
attribute.description: Indicates that this form field is available in view mode only.

attribute.name: trueText
attribute.description: For checkbox fields, displayed in view mode when the value is true. Ignored for other field types.

attribute.name: falseText
attribute.description: For checkbox fields, displayed in view mode when the value is false. Ignored for other field types.

attribute.name: dataType
attribute.description: For text fields, indicate the HTML5 data type. Defaults to text.

attribute.name: onclick
attribute.description: On click event for field types that support it.

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: On change event for field types that support it.
